short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Each time you open a new tab, a random fact waits to greet you!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Unleash the joy of learning with every new tab you open. Welcome to 'Fun Facts by Discovery Dose', your daily dose of fascinating facts and interesting information right at your fingertips! 

Tired of the same old, boring new tab page? Break the monotony with our colorful, interactive interface that pops with intriguing tidbits from around the world and across history, science, arts, and more.

Our simple, easy-to-use chrome extension opens the door to the intriguing, often overlooked corners of knowledge. It's an exciting adventure that promises something new every day. From the mysteries of the cosmos to the wonders of the natural world, from tales of human achievement to groundbreaking inventions - we've got it all!

Here's why you'll love 'Fun Facts by Discovery Dose':

Discovery Dose: Each new tab presents a fresh, handpicked fun fact that piques your curiosity and invites you to explore further.

Bookmark and Save: Found a fact that truly amazed you? Save it to revisit later or share it with friends!

Personalize Your Experience: Customize the theme to match your style and mood - because learning should be fun and engaging!

Lighten Your Day: Add a spark of surprise to your routine - who knows what you'll discover next?

So, ready to embark on this voyage of discovery? Download 'Fun Facts by Discovery Dose' and turn every new tab into an opportunity to learn something new, surprise yourself, and smile! Let's make the Internet a more interesting place, one fact at a time. 

Please note that we have done our best to ensure the accuracy of all facts presented. Enjoy your journey with confidence and peace of mind.
